channel.title: Working abilities for spirit shields?
channel.description:
Hello(please move to models section if it goes their not sure), I know that no RSPS I've ever seen has had working spirit shield's I've raped google searching for a guide or even mention of a fully working or even 10% working spirit shields. Its clear it must be hard to make it as my analysis of making it it'd require a lot of coding (professional even) a good 5-6hours of non stop work from a really good programmer. Does anybody have any information about this? The closest idea I have is work out a ratio for bonus's on the shields to absorb 17.5% 30%(or whatever shield it is) but what would you base it on? Would you base the bonus's added on of damage ratio's made by a player(sorry if this bit doesn't make sense im not experianced). Also even if this were to work, their would be no prayer drain and it still doesn't seperate the server that has it from the rest.
Also i'd like to add in(if requested i'll remove this part of the thread) if it were possible (without like 2 weeks non stop work or something) would anyone that knows their stuff be willing to make it for me for $100 or a max of $150? As im nowhere good enough to add it in. I know thats a small price for what i'd be asking done but you could most probibly (assuming people are willing to part with donations to improve their server) get like 5-10 people that'd pay like $100 each also so it could be a nice profit. Or even release it after you've received the money, that would be ideal so everyone can benefit. I will also give you 100% credits for doing so in my server if that would make a difference.
If their is a guide which I have somehow missed can someone please give me it though? I really do think its worth the effort.

item.title: Working abilities for spirit shields?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Hello(please move to models section if it goes their not sure),
I know that no RSPS I’ve ever seen has had working spirit shield’s I’ve raped google searching for a guide or even mention of a fully working or even 10% working spirit shields.
Its clear it must be hard to make it as my analysis of making it it’d require a lot of coding (professional even) a good 5-6hours of non stop work from a really good programmer.
Does anybody have any information about this? The closest idea I have is work out a ratio for bonus’s on the shields to absorb 17.5% 30%(or whatever shield it is) but what would you base it on? Would you base the bonus’s added on of damage ratio’s made by a player(sorry if this bit doesn’t make sense im not experianced).
Also even if this were to work, their would be no prayer drain and it still doesn’t seperate the server that has it from the rest.

Also i’d like to add in(if requested i’ll remove this part of the thread) if it were possible (without like 2 weeks non stop work or something) would anyone that knows their stuff be willing to make it for me for $100 or a max of $150? As im nowhere good enough to add it in.
I know thats a small price for what i’d be asking done but you could most probibly (assuming people are willing to part with donations to improve their server) get like 5-10 people that’d pay like $100 each also so it could be a nice profit. Or even release it after you’ve received the money, that would be ideal so everyone can benefit. I will also give you 100% credits for doing so in my server if that would make a difference.

If their is a guide which I have somehow missed can someone please give me it though? I really do think its worth the effort.
